name: Colour Code (2021)
description:
Colour Code was developed in 2021 as game idea prototype.

It is a 2D single-player arcade-style platform puzzler that uses the primary colours as the core collision mechanic.

The player assumes the role of a little cube character that can change colours to each of the 3 primary colours (Red, Blue, and Yellow). The way collisions work is such that the player collides with objects that are the same colour as it (eg. if the player is red then it collides with all other objects that are red). 

The player's goal is to navigate through the level, completing each puzzle along the way, and reach the exit. There are several hazards along the well that instantly kill the player, the player can also fall off the platforms. If the player is killed or they fall off a platform they will respawn at the nearest checkpoint that they have passed.

There are various environment objects that the player interacts with such as launchpads, pushable objects, and a gun that is able to destroy hazards.

The game keeps track of the player's time to complete the level. The fastest time to complete the level is recorded and saved on the menu screen.

Controls:
A, D - Move left/right
Spacebar - Jump
Enter - Shoot (when gun is equipped)
